gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 129, Kings 93
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Kings, 129-93. Brandon Ingram recorded 31 points, four rebounds, and three assists for the Pelicans, with Zion Williamson adding 26 points and five assists in the victory. Harrison Barnes had a team-high 16 points to go along with four rebounds for the Kings in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 7-7 in the regular season, while the Kings fall to 8-5.
